position: Consumer Products Supply Planning Consultant @o9 Solutions

positions.subtitle: o9 Solutions, Inc.
positions.description: My Responsibilities include, but are not limited to:- Understanding of the client requirements by participating in workshops with functional and business owners of the processes and documenting it.- Configure the o9 platform based on the blueprint laid out during design to optimize the Supply Chain via Linear Programming (LP) Solver and Supply Chain Solver (SCS).- Create and execute workflow and data analytics test-cases and document issues and track progress at resolving issues.- Support End User training for a global user base.- Collaborate with Data integration, customer success, product development and devops team to build sustainable solutions for CPG Customers- Skillset - o9 Platform, R, Python, SQL and Excel
positions.title: Senior Business Operations Specialist
positions.description_html:
My Responsibilities include, but are not limited to:
- Understanding of the client requirements by participating in workshops with functional and business owners of the processes and documenting it.
- Configure the o9 platform based on the blueprint laid out during design to optimize the Supply Chain via Linear Programming (LP) Solver and Supply Chain Solver (SCS).
- Create and execute workflow and data analytics test-cases and document issues and track progress at resolving issues.
- Support End User training for a global user base.
- Collaborate with Data integration, customer success, product development and devops team to build sustainable solutions for CPG Customers
- Skillset - o9 Platform, R, Python, SQL and Excel

experience.title: Market Research Intern
experience.description: My role as a Market Research intern were as follows:- Working as part of a team and be capable of developing collateral materials and databases.- To interpret data, and be comfortable with analytical methods, including statistical analysis, datamining, and forecasting.- Supporting team members in their development by transferring knowledge and ideas.
experience.description_html: My role as a Market Research intern were as follows:- Working as part of a team and be capable of developing collateral materials and databases.- To interpret data, and be comfortable with analytical methods, including statistical analysis, datamining, and forecasting.- Supporting team members in their development by transferring knowledge and ideas. <!---->

experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: - Worked in the Quality Control department with various equipments such as Foaming Test Apparatus, Automatic Viscometer, Digital Density Meter, Karl Fischer Analyser with Evaporator to analyse properties of Base Oil.- Studied the manufacturing process of lubricants by Automatic Batch Blender and Simultaneous Metering Blender, which is a Continuous blending process with a high output speed of 50 KL per hour.- Trained on the various Mechanical and Electrical maintenance systems, and Supply Chain management systems of plant.
experience.description_html: - Worked in the Quality Control department with various equipments such as Foaming Test Apparatus, Automatic Viscometer, Digital Density Meter, Karl Fischer Analyser with Evaporator to analyse properties of Base Oil.- Studied the manufacturing process of lubricants by Automatic Batch Blender and Simultaneous Metering Blender, which is a Continuous blending process with a high output speed of 50 KL per hour.- Trained on the various Mechanical and Electrical maintenance systems, and Supply Chain management systems of plant.

experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: - Worked in Service Training Centre and understood the Commercial vehicle industry with hands-on exercises.- Studied and explored the potential of BS-6 technology and its advantages and disadvantages w.r.t BS-4- Trained in research centre of Ashok Leyland where I got hands on experience on equipment for oil and fuel testing such as Fourier transform Infrared spectroscopy (FTIR) and thermogravimetric analysis (TGA). I also performed various tests to check the hardness of materials such as Vicker hardness test, Spectro analyser, hardness Rockwell C-scale (HRC) testing machine.
experience.description_html: - Worked in Service Training Centre and understood the Commercial vehicle industry with hands-on exercises.- Studied and explored the potential of BS-6 technology and its advantages and disadvantages w.r.t BS-4- Trained in research centre of Ashok Leyland where I got hands on experience on equipment for oil and fuel testing such as Fourier transform Infrared spectroscopy (FTIR) and thermogravimetric analysis (TGA). I also performed various tests to check the hardness of materials such as Vicker hardness test, Spectro analyser, hardness Rockwell C-scale (HRC) testing machine.

projects: [{"title":"Understanding the solubility of CH4 and CO2 in Deep Eutectic Solvents by Molecular Dynamics using Finite-Difference Thermodynamic Integration (FDTI)","start_date":"Aug 2020","end_date":"May 2021","description":"The increasing energy demands due to increased population has led to usage of fossil fuels at a faster pace which are exhausting Greenhouse gases and are affecting the environment. As the Ionic liquids are replacing the conventional solvents for sequestration though they are costlier and toxic towards the environment. Our research on the solubility of these gases in DESs is motivated by the desire to find more environmentally friendly options for their sequestration."},{},{},{},{"title":"Molecular Dynamics Study of Deep Eutectic Solvents","start_date":"Jan 2020","end_date":"May 2020","description":"Prepared a DES solution by packing the selected molecules in Packmol then simulated the compound in LAMMPS (open-source software from NASA) and analyzed trends in various properties such as Density, Bond Energy, Potential Energy, Total Energy at various temperatures with a maximum error of 1.5%."},{},{},{}]
